TEXT.TITLE: INLAND STEEL <IAD> TO MAKE "MAJOR ANNOUNCEMENT"
TEXT.BODY: Inland Steel Industries Inc said it will hold a news conference at 1545 CST here today to make a "major announcement with international business ramifications." No other details were immediately available. Reuter
